extendedInfo.description: Weather Forecast â 50 million people are using this app to receive live and accurate weather info or local alerts. This one has the highest 4.5 star rating! GO Weather forecasts on 100,000+ locations worldwide, provides detailed weather report, accurate weather forecast, incredibly beautiful user interface with variety of widget themes and live wallpapers. Being your best weather prophet is always what we are pursuing.â TestimonialsâGO Weather beats a weather forecaster on the TV easily. It also beats most of the websites I have been using.â  - Appstorm"This app has won the award: 2012 Awards - Best Weather App or Widget" - BestMobileAppAwardsâThe app is so configured that it gives the weather of more than tens of thousands locations and cities with its proper and accurate report of weather anytime and anywhere. It is the best app on your device to give weather report with accuracy and is above our expectation.â  - TechclonesâYou will find this application to be a welcome replacement to the bore of the stock Android widgets and will find the weather forecasts to be sufficient and visually attractive.â  - Androidtappâ Free Features- Accurate and local forecasts for 100,000+ locations worldwide- Detailed weather report, including time, date, feeling like, high & low temperature, wind, humidity, visibility, sunrise and sunset, severe weather alert, etc.- Multiple cities feature is perfect for a trip plan- 2*1, 4*1, 4*2 current weather widgets & 4*1, 4*2 future weather forecast widgets- Widget themes and live wallpaper for 7+ weather conditions in day and night mode: sunny, rainy, snowy, thunder, cloudy, overcast and foggy- Share your current weather info with your friends by taking a pictureâ Pro Features- Probability of precipitation forecast - World clock integrated to display current time and weather info for selected cities- 24-hour & 10-day detailed weather forecast- Exclusively designed widget themes for Premium Version (keep increasing)- No sponsored messages or Adsâ FAQ1.I have downgraded from premium to free. How do I get the paid version back? Logon the account you paid for your premium version before > Enter advanced features intro page > Select the payment method you chose before > Your billing info & payment record being checked> Upgrade to the premium after successful checking2.How to change the temperature unit? Launcher GO Weather EX > Menu > Settings > Weather info > Temperature Unit â Follow UsFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/GO-Weather-EX/488274257857852Twitter: https://twitter.com/GOWeatherEXâ Contact UsE-mail: golauncher@goforandroid.comUse of this app is governed by our Terms of Service: http://www.goforandroid.com/GDTEN/terms-of-service.htm and Privacy Policy: http://www.goforandroid.com/GDTEN/privacy.htm

reviews.title: I love it.
reviews.comment: I love this app. It\'s easy to read, and nice to look at. I can go through this app with no problems.
reviews.author: Wanda Jackson

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: The best of many weather apps I\'ve used over the years! Designed beautifully, intuitively functional, excellent layout. As expected, the Go Team once again excels above all.
reviews.author: Jack Logan

reviews.title: Love this app! I give it 5 stars
reviews.comment: I love this app! I\'m in high school and i walk to school so its nice to know the weather before i have to walk. And the animation is soo cute! Thanks to the creators!
reviews.author: Elly Hiebert

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Easy to interprete..and accurate forecast.i gave it five star wish future improvement.
reviews.author: ray ghartey

reviews.title: Great but.....
reviews.comment: Great app but uninstall due to no weather alert notice built into widget. If added I would purchese the paid version.
reviews.author: Warren Yoakum

reviews.title: I like it is the best I recommended
reviews.comment: This app is one of the best I love it
reviews.author: Anselmo Perez

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Very nice app.  I like how you can scroll through your cities and all the info available.  I checked out a lot of apps before deciding  this one.
reviews.author: Ez Target

reviews.title: App that matters
reviews.comment: Guys this application is same as others BUT is has really kool design it the best weather app.

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: Keep getting the notification, failed to get weather. With full service. Please fix

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent weather app!
reviews.author: Melissa Bryant

reviews.title: Too many ads to even evaluate
reviews.comment: Might have been worthwhile, but all the ads everywhere made me blow this off. Uninstalling.  I did like one of the active backgrounds with fireflies.
reviews.author: Samulel J. Sungthir

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very nice widget .. I use it in my canvas HD and its provide all type of information related to weather
reviews.author: nitesh Singh

reviews.comment: I have just started using the app. It is simply fantastic, no problem faced, all info very well displayed\tI rate this app. as 4 star.
reviews.author: Capt. Raza Abbas

reviews.title: *****Must have*****
reviews.comment: Amazing interphase. Very clean design. Intuitive. Great live wallpaper. No Battery life issues. No slowing of the phone. I am using a paid version on my Galaxy Note 2.
reviews.author: Md Ahmad

reviews.title: Quick and easy to view
reviews.comment: Other similar apps take a while to load up and sometimes take long updating current weather. This has worked excellent so far.
reviews.author: William Maldonado

reviews.title: ***Read comment***
reviews.comment: If you\'re using a verizon phone not support about third party applications this app is great helpful you can set it as a live background weather updates temperature humidity 7 day forecast awesome app thanks Google

reviews.title: Lg optimus g
reviews.comment: Excellent widget choices, nice backround pics to look at. Up to date and accurate so far. Easy set up and enjoy.
reviews.author: Deanna Wangerin

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Well done. Wicked easy to use.  Wicked ready to see.  Wicked accurate.  Thanks!
